trans-unit.source: Arranges child elements into a single line that can be oriented horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: Dispone gli elementi figlio in una singola riga che può essere orientata orizzontalmente o verticalmente.

trans-unit.source: A StackPanel contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects, which are in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Un elemento StackPanel contiene una raccolta di <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>oggetti, che si trovano nel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The default value is stretch for both <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> of content that is contained in a StackPanel.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è esteso per <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>di contenuto che è contenuto in un elemento StackPanel.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Panel elements do not receive focus by default.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi del riquadro non viene visualizzato lo stato attivo per impostazione predefinita.

trans-unit.source: To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Per forzare un elemento del pannello per ricevere lo stato attivo, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>

trans-unit.source: StackPanel implements the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo> interface to support logical scrolling.
trans-unit.target: StackPanel implementa il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo>interfaccia per supportare lo scorrimento logico.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo>

trans-unit.source: Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: Logico viene utilizzato per scorrere all'elemento successivo nell'albero logico.

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction.
trans-unit.target: Ciò si differenzia durante lo scorrimento fisico scorre il contenuto di un incremento fisico definito in una direzione specificata.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host StackPanel element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario uno scorrimento fisico anziché logico, eseguire il wrapping dell'elemento StackPanel host in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Dispone il contenuto di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that this element should use to arrange its child elements.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> che questo elemento deve utilizzare per disporre gli elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that represents the arranged size of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"></xref> element and its child elements.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> che rappresenta la dimensione disposta del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"> </xref> elemento e i relativi elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"></xref> can scroll in the horizontal dimension.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"> </xref> può scorrere nella dimensione orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: This property is not intended to be used in your code.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà non deve essere utilizzato nel codice.

trans-unit.source: It is exposed publicly to fulfill an interface contract (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo>).
trans-unit.target: Viene esposta pubblicamente per soddisfare un contratto di interfaccia (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo>).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Impostazione di questa proprietà non ha alcun effetto.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario uno scorrimento fisico anziché logico, eseguire il wrapping di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if content can scroll in the horizontal dimension; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il contenuto può scorrere nella dimensione orizzontale; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether content can scroll in the vertical dimension.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il contenuto può scorrere nella dimensione verticale.

trans-unit.source: This property is not intended for use in your code.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà non è destinata all'utilizzo nel codice.

trans-unit.source: It is exposed publicly to fulfill an interface contract (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo>).
trans-unit.target: Viene esposta pubblicamente per soddisfare un contratto di interfaccia (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo>).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Impostazione di questa proprietà non ha alcun effetto.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario uno scorrimento fisico anziché logico, eseguire il wrapping di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if content can scroll in the vertical dimension; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il contenuto può scorrere nella dimensione verticale; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the vertical size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che contiene la dimensione verticale dell'extent.

trans-unit.source: The returned value is described in Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: Il valore restituito è descritto in DIP (Device Independent pixel).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Double> that represents the vertical size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta la dimensione verticale dell'extent.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0,0.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the horizontal size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che contiene la dimensione orizzontale dell'extent.

trans-unit.source: The returned value is described in Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: Il valore restituito è descritto in DIP (Device Independent pixel).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Double> that represents the horizontal size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta la dimensione orizzontale dell'extent.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0,0.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates if this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"></xref> has vertical or horizontal orientation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"> </xref> ha un orientamento verticale o orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `true` because a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> must have either vertical or horizontal orientation.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce sempre `true` perché un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>deve avere orientamento verticale o orizzontale.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che contiene l'offset orizzontale del contenuto a scorrimento.

trans-unit.source: The returned value is described in Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: Il valore restituito è descritto in DIP (Device Independent pixel).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Double> that represents the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta l'offset orizzontale del contenuto a scorrimento.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0,0.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content downward by one logical unit.
trans-unit.target: Scorre il contenuto verso il basso di un'unità logica.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario uno scorrimento fisico anziché logico, eseguire il wrapping di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content by one logical unit to the left.
trans-unit.target: Scorre il contenuto di un'unità logica a sinistra.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario uno scorrimento fisico anziché logico, eseguire il wrapping di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content by one logical unit to the right.
trans-unit.target: Scorre il contenuto di un'unità logica a destra.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario uno scorrimento fisico anziché logico, eseguire il wrapping di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content by one logical unit upward.
trans-unit.target: Scorre il contenuto di un'unità logica verso l'alto.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario uno scorrimento fisico anziché logico, eseguire il wrapping di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che rappresenta il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"> </xref> del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls to the specified coordinates and makes that part of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> visible.
trans-unit.target: Lo scorrimento delle coordinate specificate e rende quella parte di un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> visibile.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that becomes visible.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> che diventa visibile.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents coordinate space within a visual.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> che rappresenta lo spazio all'interno di un oggetto visivo delle coordinate.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> in the coordinate space that is made visible.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> nello spazio di coordinate che viene reso visibile.

trans-unit.source: Measures the child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"></xref> in anticipation of arranging them during the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.ArrangeOverride*> pass.
trans-unit.target: Misura gli elementi figlio di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"> </xref> in previsione della loro disposizione durante l' <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.ArrangeOverride*>archiviazione.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.ArrangeOverride*>

trans-unit.source: An upper limit <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that should not be exceeded.
trans-unit.target: Un limite superiore <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> che non deve essere superato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that represents the desired size of the element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> che rappresenta le dimensioni desiderate dell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content logically downward in response to a click of the mouse wheel button.
trans-unit.target: Scorre il contenuto in modo logico verso il basso in risposta a un clic del pulsante rotellina del mouse.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario uno scorrimento fisico anziché logico, eseguire il wrapping di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content logically to the left in response to a click of the mouse wheel button.
trans-unit.target: Scorre il contenuto in modo logico a sinistra in risposta a un clic del pulsante rotellina del mouse.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario uno scorrimento fisico anziché logico, eseguire il wrapping di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content logically to the right in response to a click of the mouse wheel button.
trans-unit.target: Scorre il contenuto in modo logico a destra in risposta a un clic del pulsante rotellina del mouse.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario uno scorrimento fisico anziché logico, eseguire il wrapping di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content logically upward in response to a click of the mouse wheel button.
trans-unit.target: Scorre il contenuto in modo logico verso l'alto in risposta a un clic del pulsante rotellina del mouse.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario uno scorrimento fisico anziché logico, eseguire il wrapping di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the dimension by which child elements are stacked.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica la dimensione in base alla quale gli elementi figlio sono in pila.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`||

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref> of child content.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"> </xref> del contenuto figlio.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.Orientation*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.Orientation*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.Orientation*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content logically downward by one page.
trans-unit.target: Scorre il contenuto in modo logico verso il basso di una pagina.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario uno scorrimento fisico anziché logico, eseguire il wrapping di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content logically to the left by one page.
trans-unit.target: Scorre il contenuto in modo logico a sinistra di una pagina.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario uno scorrimento fisico anziché logico, eseguire il wrapping di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content logically to the right by one page.
trans-unit.target: Scorre il contenuto in modo logico a destra di una pagina.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario uno scorrimento fisico anziché logico, eseguire il wrapping di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content logically upward by one page.
trans-unit.target: Scorre il contenuto in modo logico verso l'alto di una pagina.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario uno scorrimento fisico anziché logico, eseguire il wrapping di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that identifies the container that controls scrolling behavior in this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che identifica il contenitore che controlla il comportamento di scorrimento in questo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control is the ScrollOwner, physical scrolling is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>controllo è il ScrollOwner, viene abilitato lo scorrimento fisico.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is the ScrollOwner, scrolling is logical by child element.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>è ScrollOwner, lo scorrimento è logico dall'elemento figlio.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> that owns scrolling for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> che possiede lo scorrimento per <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà non è previsto alcun valore predefinito.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.HorizontalOffset*> property.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.HorizontalOffset*>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.HorizontalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.HorizontalOffset*> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.HorizontalOffset*>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.HorizontalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.VerticalOffset*> property.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.VerticalOffset*>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.VerticalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.VerticalOffset*> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.VerticalOffset*>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel.VerticalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the vertical offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che contiene l'offset verticale del contenuto a scorrimento.

trans-unit.source: The returned value is described in Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: Il valore restituito è descritto in DIP (Device Independent pixel).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Double> that represents the vertical offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta l'offset verticale del contenuto a scorrimento.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0,0.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the vertical size of the content's viewport.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che contiene la dimensione verticale del viewport del contenuto.

trans-unit.source: The returned value is described in Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: Il valore restituito è descritto in DIP (Device Independent pixel).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Double> that represents the vertical size of the content's viewport.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta la dimensione verticale del viewport del contenuto.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0,0.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the horizontal size of the content's viewport.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che contiene la dimensione orizzontale del viewport del contenuto.

trans-unit.source: The returned value is described in Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: Il valore restituito è descritto in DIP (Device Independent pixel).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Double> that represents the vertical size of the content's viewport.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta la dimensione verticale del viewport del contenuto.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0,0.
